title: Isa tk+
overview: Isa, now a pop idol, is sent by her record label to study at a renowned performing arts school. Alex, her best friend Linda, and the inimitable Rey follow her. But living in a new city brings many changes. She signs a contract with a new record label, is separated from Alex and her band, is consumed with trying to help her friend Linda keep her scholarship, and even helps save the school from shutting down. In the midst of all these changes and adventures, the always happy and radiant Isa, will need to choose between her friends and her growing fame.
